page.loginCtaText: I have an account, I log in
page.signinCtaText: I don't have an account, Registration

authCard.loginDescription: Choose to log in with your e-mail address, via github or google.
authCard.signinDescription: Register with your e-mail address, via Github or Google.
authCard.testimonialComment: "A revolutionary project management solution: powerful, intuitive and fully customizable. Simplify your project management today!"

agreeConditionText: By clicking continue, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
